医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
有效老年护理的数字技术：成功、挑战和未来前景研究人员讨论了使用数字技术的当前成就、挑战和潜在机遇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Digital-technologies-for-efficient-geriatric-care-successes-challenges-and-future-perspectives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Digital-technologies-for-efficient-geriatric-care-successes-challenges-and-future-perspectives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d7c44e2-3c49-4bf9-8efe-8bcc748931c9 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 04:16:00 -0400 Digital technologies for effective geriatric care: successes, challenges and future perspectives
免疫增强模型克服了泄漏和极化疫苗接种模型的局限性研究人员比较了疫苗接种和免疫动态模型的不同方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Immune-boosting-model-overcomes-the-limitations-of-the-leaky-and-polarized-vaccination-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Immune-boosting-model-overcomes-the-limitations-of-the-leaky-and-polarized-vaccination-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e8dd21c-97e6-4f00-837a-eadfa0422a35 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 04:15:00 -0400 Immune boosting model overcomes the limitations of the leaky and polarized vaccination models
研究将儿科创伤性脑损伤视为精神病或症状的潜在危险因素科学家进行了一项荟萃分析，以评估儿童创伤性脑损伤是否是精神病或症状的潜在危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Study-examines-pediatric-traumatic-brain-injury-as-a-pottial-risk-factor-for-psychotic-disorders-or-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Study-examines-pediatric-traumatic-brain-injury-as-a-pottial-risk-factor-for-psychotic-disorders-or-symptoms.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fae74af0-a2c2-47fd-8705-435ed5bf8f7e Fri, 21 Jul 2023 03:56:00 -0400 Study examines pediatric traumatic brain injury as a potential risk factor for psychotic disorders or symptoms
膳食补充剂对接种灭活 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗的孕妇抗体水平的影响研究人员讨论了补充剂对使用灭活疫苗接种 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗后抗体水平的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/The-effect-of-dietary-supplements-on-antibody-levels-in-pregnant-women-vaccinated-with-inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-疫苗.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/The-effect-of-dietary-supplements-on-antibody-levels-in-pregnant-women-vaccinated-with-inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-疫苗.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd27a2db-b3f0-402b-89c4-f5a02dda2d3b Fri, 21 Jul 2023 03:43:00 -0400 The effect of dietary supplements on antibody levels in pregnant women vaccinated with inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine
LifeLongFit 项目获得资助，探索轻度压力对健康老龄化的影响来自耶拿莱布尼茨老龄化研究所 - 弗里茨·利普曼研究所 (FLI) 的 Maria Ermolaeva 博士获得了欧盟颁发的令人垂涎的 ERC Consolidator 补助金，金额为 200 万欧元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/LifeLongFit-project-receives-funding-to-explore-the-effects-of-mild-stress-on-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/LifeLongFit-project-receives-funding-to-explore-the-effects-of-mild-stress-on-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bef6fb85-ba78-4c72-9f10-82b1fcbb315a Thu, 20 Jul 2023 23:37:56 -0400 LifeLongFit project receives funding to explore the effects of mild stress on healthy aging
医学杂志决定保留有争议的堕胎论文引发了关于编辑独立性的争论《英国精神病学杂志》上一篇受到高度批评的论文在美国法律案件中被引用，以限制堕胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Medical-journals-decision-to-keep-controversial-abortion-paper-sparks-debate-over-editorial-independence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Medical-journals-decision-to-keep-controversial-abortion-paper-sparks-debate-over-editorial-independence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80e5bf24-3d77-4521-a362-879e57836fd1 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 23:32:35 -0400 Medical journal's decision to keep controversial abortion paper sparks debate over editorial independence
CMS 正式承认街道是提供医疗服务的合法场所医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 (CMS) 正式承认可以在街头提供医疗服务，这使得像南加州大学街头医疗团队这样的提供者能够获得为目前无家可归者提供的服务的报销。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/CMS-officially-recognizes-street-as-legitimate-place-to-deliver-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/CMS-officially-recognizes-street-as-legitimate-place-to-deliver-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b44bd02-1671-4303-ad9d-d4cea83f6062 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 23:26:04 -0400 CMS officially recognizes street as legitimate place to deliver healthcare
ECOG-ACRIN 启动新试验评估尼罗替尼和紫杉醇治疗晚期癌症ECOG-ACRIN 癌症研究小组已在一项新的治疗试验中招募了第一位患者，以评估在标准紫杉醇化疗中添加尼洛替尼的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/ECOG-ACRIN-launches-new-trial-to-evaluate-nilotinib-and-paclitaxel-for-advanced-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/ECOG-ACRIN-launches-new-tri-to-evaluate-nilotinib-and-paclitaxel-for-advanced-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78601f4a-3de9-4388-bdb3-66ac52c867c5 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 23:15:28 -0400 ECOG-ACRIN launches new trial to evaluate nilotinib and paclitaxel for advanced cancers
数字病理技术将改变医学诊断经过为期十年的旨在改变医学诊断的研究项目后，患者将获得更快、更准确的病理结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Digital-pathology-technology-set-to-transform-medical-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Digital-pathology-technology-set-to-transform-medical-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40c81146-ee80-4756-8596-2a0f4e6d8460 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 22:59:59 -0400 Digital pathology technology set to transform medical diagnosis
研究揭示逆境对人类肠道微生物组的跨代影响由加州大学洛杉矶分校心理学家领导的一个国际科学家团队报告说，母亲在童年或怀孕期间经历的困难反映在她们 2 岁孩子肠道微生物群的组成中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Research-reveals-trans Generational-effects-of-adversity-on-the- human-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Research-reveals-trans Generational-effects-of-adversity-on-the- human-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74e6b873-c40e-41db-b431-6332b1e3c715 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 22:54:38 -0400 Research reveals transgenerational effects of adversity on the human gut microbiome
